dataList.name: Protection Umbrella
Interlocking Time
dataList.desc: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gana 3 Bind next turn.
dataList.summary: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 2 times the accumulated damage, and gana 3 Bind next turn.

dataList.name: Borrowed Time
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, gana 3 Haste, 2 Damage Up, and 2 Nivel Ofensivo Aumentado; If only 1 Count remains at the end of the turn, gana 3 Bind, 1 Attack Power Down, and 2 Fragile next turn

dataList.name: Crown of Thorns
dataList.desc: Generates a Rose unit whose Affinity corresponds to the most-owned Skill Affinity of the target inflicted with this effect

dataList.name: Blooming Sin
dataList.desc:
At the end of the turn
- Gana 1 Count.
- {2} loses HP equal to 25% of Max HP.
- Lose 10% of {1} E.G.O resource.
- The Sign of Roses heals 5% of Max HP.

At 4 Count,
- {2} dies.
- Lose all of {1} E.G.O resource.

dataList.name: Drenched Sin
dataList.desc:
Gain Max HP by {0}%(E.G.O resource drained).

On Death
- Regain {0} of {1} E.G.O resource.
- {2} heals HP by (25% of Identity's Max HP x Blooming Sin Stack at death).
